name: Circular Demolition
description:
IMPORTANT: Epilepsy Warning! Some of the effects in the game may hurt you so please be careful and play at your own risk!

This game was made by me and my friend, he made most of the game while I just added some small features to it. In the game you play as a circle who has to kill as many other circles as possible and the more you do the more your score goes.

3rd Party Assets Used:

- Font
- Music

GitHub: Circular Demolition's GitHub 

Devlog:

If you want to know about how the game was made, it was made using Python 3.9 and Pygame 2.0.0, you can get them by following this tutorial: 

You can also join my Discord Server if you have any questions:
https://discord.gg/GYRkPevG6u

Have fun playing!

If your on Windows, just download the Circular-Demolition-Windows.zip file, then unzip it, go into the folder and run the .exe, remember to extract all the files otherwise you may get an error like,  "Failed to Execute Script Main" or something similar to the lines of this.  

To Contact the Developers on Discord:
